review: It was Myanmar's most exported fish caught in the wild, but that is no longer the case as stocks have declined in recent decades.

review: Due to the demand and popularity of this species, overfishing is rampant. Fishes weighing around 2 to 3 kilograms have become rare in Bangladesh.
